channel.title: Donator store
channel.description: ok i searched for quite a long time on here browsing on how to make a store that everyone can get into but only donators can buy stuff..like u have to have a certain amount of donator points to buy it tho.. can anyone help me out

item.title: Donator store
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote author=recker450 link=topic=457550.msg3348638#msg3348638 date=1285038462]
why not

if (NPCID == #### && donator == 1) { openUpShop(##); } else { sendMessage("Sorry, you need to be a donator to buy from this shop"); }

It probably wouldn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator store
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

why not

[quote]
if (NPCID == #### && donator == 1) {
openUpShop(##);
} else {
sendMessage(“Sorry, you need to be a donator to buy from this shop”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Donator store
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

bink0100:

wow all of this is confusing can someone just help me on team viewer?

I’ll try to explain it:

if (NPCID == ####) && (donator == 1) { openUpShop(##); } else if(NPCID == ####) (&& donator == 0) { sendMessage("Sorry, you need to be a donator to open this shop"); }

In case 17:
Add the code provided above, it will make it so nobody but donators can trade the shop owner. Although you have to replace the #### with the npc ID :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Donator store
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

yea what scape-java said

put it in
case 17: //for 2nd click npc(trading)
case 155: // for 1st click npc(talking and stuff)

and why not

if (NPCID == #### && donator >= 1) { openUpShop(##); } else if(NPCID == #### && donator == 0) { sM("Sorry, you need to be a donator to open this shop"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Donator store
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

if (NPCID == ####) && (donator == 1) { openUpShop(##); } else if(NPCID == ####) (&& donator == 0) { sendMessage("Sorry, you need to be a donator to open this shop"); }

OR, you add a condition into your npc clicking packet in your client class.
For the donator shop, or something similar to that.

Read full topic
